source:
Cosy House in Central London

£430,000

London SW1A 1AA

Do you like this property?
Call agent Email agent

Description

  • Ideally located near tube station
  • Open plan kitchen
  • Bicycle storage, visitors parking, communal gardens and roof terraces

View on map

Floorplan

Mortgage Calculator

Properties sold nearby

Show more

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

This sample showcases how to build a housing page in AMP HTML. Explore how to use amp components, like `amp-carousel`, `form` and `amp-list` to create a housing page.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

This sample showcases how to build a housing page in AMP HTML. Explore how to use amp components, like amp-carousel, form and amp-list to create a housing page.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

This sample showcases how to build a housing page in AMP HTML. Explore how to use amp components, like `amp-carousel`, `form` and `amp-list` to create a housing page.

sections.doc_: ## Setup
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Setup

sections.doc_: We use `amp-carousel` to show house images.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-carousel` to show house images.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-accordion` to hide and show additional data about an house product.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-accordion` to hide and show additional data about an house product.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-list` to show a list of properties.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-list` to show a list of properties.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-mustache` as a format template for `amp-list`.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-mustache` as a format template for `amp-list`.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-social-share` for adding platform sharing buttons.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-social-share` for adding platform sharing buttons.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-iframe` to embed a map of the house location.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-iframe` to embed a map of the house location.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-form` to implement a mortgage calculator.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-form` to implement a mortgage calculator.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-fit-text` to fit the title of the house page to the page.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-fit-text` to fit the title of the house page to the page.

sections.doc_: We use `amp-analytics` to track page users.
sections.normalizedDoc_: We use `amp-analytics` to track page users.

sections.code:
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/e-commerce/housing/index.html">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
    <style amp-custom>
    :root {
      --color-primary: #005AF0;
      --space-1: 0.5rem; /* 8px */
      --space-2: 1rem;   /* 16px */
      --space-3: 1.5rem; /* 24px */
    }
    .description {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
    }
    .description li {
      list-style-type: square;
    }
    .housing-description {
      clear: both;
    }
    .image-gallery {
      margin: 0;
    }
    .additional-data p, .additional-data h2 {
      padding: var(--space-2);
    }
    .additional-data h2 {
      font-size: 18px;
    }
    .related {
      background-color: #f5f5f5;
      display: block;
      color: #111;
      height: 100px;
      padding: 0;
      padding-right: var(--space-1);
    }
    .related amp-img {
      line-height: 24px;
      font-weight: 400;
      font-size: 24px;
      vertical-align: middle;
      float: left;
      margin-right: 10px;
    }
    .related:active {
      background-color: #ccc;
    }
    .price-description {
      color: var(--color-primary);
      font-weight: 400;
    }
    .price-heading {
      margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
      margin-top: var(--space-3);
      padding: 0 var(--space-2);
    }
    .price-other {
      font-weight: bold;
    }
    .contact-section {
      margin-top: var(--space-2);
      display: flex;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
    }
    @media (max-width: 744px) {
      .contact-section {
        display: block;
      }
    }
    @media (max-width: 744px) {
      .contact {
        display: flex;
        margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        margin-top: var(--space-3);
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 0 var(--space-2);
      }
    }
    .social-share {
      line-height: 36px;
      display: flex;
    }
    .list-overflow {
      position: absolute;
      bottom: 0;
    }
    .form-field-right {
      border: 1px solid #dfdfdf;
      background: white;
      width: 200px;
    }
    .form-field-left {
      width: 200px;
    }
    .ampstart-card {
      text-decoration: none;
    }
    </style>

    <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
    </head>
<body>

sections.doc_: ## Price
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Price

sections.doc_: [amp-fit-text](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-fit-text-v0.1.md) can be used to fit the text to the available space. It works well for titles that vary not too much in length.
sections.code:
Cosy House in Central London

£430,000

London SW1A 1AA
sections.preview:
Cosy House in Central London

£430,000

London SW1A 1AA
sections.normalizedDoc_: [amp-fit-text](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-fit-text-v0.1.md) can be used to fit the text to the available space. It works well for titles that vary not too much in length.

sections.doc_: ## Image gallery
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Image gallery

sections.doc_: The `amp-carousel` works very well for housing image galleries. Learn more about `amp-carousel` [here](/advanced/image_galleries_with_amp-carousel/).
sections.code:
<amp-carousel class="image-gallery"
  width="512"
  height="384"
  layout="responsive"
  type="slides">
  <amp-img src="/static/samples/img/buckingham_palace_building_1280x960.jpg"
    layout="fill"
    alt="Buckingham Palace"
    attribution="https://pixabay.com"></amp-img>
  <amp-img src="/static/samples/img/buckingham_palace_entrance_1280x853.jpg"
    layout="fill"
    alt="Buckingham Palace entrance"
    attribution="https://pixabay.com"></amp-img>
</amp-carousel>
sections.preview:
<amp-carousel class="image-gallery"
    width="512"
    height="384"
    layout="responsive"
    type="slides">
    <amp-img src="/static/samples/img/buckingham_palace_building_1280x960.jpg"
      layout="fill"
      alt="Buckingham Palace"
      attribution="https://pixabay.com"></amp-img>
    <amp-img src="/static/samples/img/buckingham_palace_entrance_1280x853.jpg"
      layout="fill"
      alt="Buckingham Palace entrance"
      attribution="https://pixabay.com"></amp-img>
  </amp-carousel>
sections.normalizedDoc_: The `amp-carousel` works very well for housing image galleries. Learn more about `amp-carousel` [here](/advanced/image_galleries_with_amp-carousel/).

sections.doc_: ## Detail request section
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Detail request section

sections.doc_: These buttons are used for requesting details on the property.
sections.code:
Do you like this property?
Call agent Email agent
sections.preview:
Do you like this property?
Call agent Email agent
sections.normalizedDoc_: These buttons are used for requesting details on the property.

sections.doc_: ## Social
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Social

sections.doc_: The Social Share extension provides a common interface for share buttons. Learn more about `amp-social-share` [here](/documentation/components/amp-social-share).
sections.normalizedDoc_: The Social Share extension provides a common interface for share buttons. Learn more about `amp-social-share` [here](/documentation/components/amp-social-share).

sections.doc_: ## Collapsibles/Accordion
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Collapsibles/Accordion

sections.doc_: Use `amp-accordion` to hide and show additional data about your product. Learn more about `amp-accordion` [here](/documentation/components/reference/amp-accordion.html). Embedding Google Maps is possible via the [Google Maps Embed API](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/embed/guide), see [here](https://amp.dev/documentation/examples/components/amp-iframe/) for a sample.
sections.code:
Description

  • Ideally located near tube station
  • Open plan kitchen
  • Bicycle storage, visitors parking, communal gardens and roof terraces

View on map

Floorplan
sections.preview:
Description

  • Ideally located near tube station
  • Open plan kitchen
  • Bicycle storage, visitors parking, communal gardens and roof terraces

View on map

Floorplan
sections.normalizedDoc_: Use `amp-accordion` to hide and show additional data about your product. Learn more about `amp-accordion` [here](/documentation/components/reference/amp-accordion.html). Embedding Google Maps is possible via the [Google Maps Embed API](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/embed/guide), see [here](https://amp.dev/documentation/examples/components/amp-iframe/) for a sample.

sections.doc_: ## Mortgage calculator
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Mortgage calculator

sections.doc_: Use `amp-form` to implement a mortgage calculator. Learn more about `amp-form` [here](/documentation/components/amp-form).
sections.code: Mortgage Calculator
sections.preview: Mortgage Calculator
sections.normalizedDoc_: Use `amp-form` to implement a mortgage calculator. Learn more about `amp-form` [here](/documentation/components/amp-form).

sections.doc_: ## Properties sold nearby
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## Properties sold nearby

sections.doc_: Use `amp-list` to show a list of properties sold nearby. Learn more about `amp-list` [here](/documentation/components/amp-list)
sections.code:
Properties sold nearby

Show more
sections.preview:
Properties sold nearby

Show more
sections.normalizedDoc_: Use `amp-list` to show a list of properties sold nearby. Learn more about `amp-list` [here](/documentation/components/amp-list)

sections.doc_: ## User analytics
sections.normalizedDoc_: ## User analytics

sections.doc_: Analytics must be configured in the body. Here we use Google Analytics to track pageviews.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Analytics must be configured in the body. Here we use Google Analytics to track pageviews.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>Housing</title>
    <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-carousel" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-carousel-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-accordion" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-accordion-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-list" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-list-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-template="amp-mustache" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-mustache-0.2.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-social-share" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-social-share-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-iframe" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-iframe-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-form" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-form-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-fit-text" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-fit-text-0.1.js"></script>
    <script async custom-element="amp-analytics" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-analytics-0.1.js"></script>

    <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/e-commerce/housing/index.html">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">

    <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
